blog.name: estramor
blog.title: council of stars
blog.description: <center>we will take what is ours, with fire and blood.</center>

tags: was last night even real? we just don't know.
summary: don't you hate it when you set out to talk to a guy and instead end up in a high stakes shipjacking improv operation involving...
body: don’t you hate it when you set out to talk to a guy and instead end up in a high stakes shipjacking improv operation involving firebombs, axes, illusory suicide, charmed guards, taking a hostage, a lost owl, nearly feeding your company firbolg to the sharks and/or kraken (literally), with a panicking clueless monk and a mostly-dead half-orc as your boatswain and captain, respectively? i hate it when that happens. fuckin professor thaddeus. it’s all his fault, somehow

reblog.comment: don’t you hate it when you set out to talk to a guy and instead end up in a high stakes shipjacking improv operation involving firebombs, axes, illusory suicide, charmed guards, taking a hostage, a lost owl, nearly feeding your company firbolg to the sharks and/or kraken (literally), with a panicking clueless monk and a mostly-dead half-orc as your boatswain and captain, respectively? i hate it when that happens. fuckin professor thaddeus. it’s all his fault, somehow

blog.name: captain-narava-felidae-riggs
blog.title: The tide has washed the nice from me
blog.description: WOW/SWTOR. Captain Narava of both worlds. Goblin. My hobbies include: Crying while watching hockey, crying while watching Critical Role, and crying while watching Glee clips on YouTube. Also knitting. Over 40 and cool with it. Perniciously Aneimic, hella anxious, depressed widow, biromantic demisexual . Slytherin. OTP: Narava/Corso, Alt OTP: Avarane/Corso, Completely different fandom otp: Perc'ahlia. Pens/Stanley Cup. She/her. Unless you’re Taliesin Jaffe, I’m not interested.

summary: episode 1 so far
title: episode 1 so far
body:
-cat. cat? cat!

-imaginary beer snobs

-roll to see if the secondhand book shop has anything good

…its honestly kind of ridiculous how excited I am about going to this WEIRD FUCKIN’ carnival!!!

tags: things have not gone well for fjord this episode
summary:
Fjord is not having a good day
Thunder steps and makes noise. The Solezo notice
The one sailor is not present in moving the...
body:
Fjord is not having a good day

  • Thunder steps and makes noise. The Solezo notice
  • The one sailor is not present in moving the ship. But is instead below deck chasin someone. Almost gets knocked unconscious
  • Tries to find Clay. Can’t find him cause he’s disguised as an old man and Fjord doesn’t know.


There’s more but these are like what I can think from the top of my head. Also I haven’t even finished the ep yet…

tags: wow i made a sad. its been a while
summary:
....dupli Jester pretends to kill herself and traumatize someone so they don’t find her
BUT
What if Marian finds out? Some blue...
body:
….dupli Jester pretends to kill herself and traumatize someone so they don’t find her


BUT


What if Marian finds out? Some blue tiefling with her daughter’s description stabbed herself with an axe and her body can’t be found.


Now she thinks her daughter is dead and she can’t really say anything since no one knew

blog.name: crinktober
blog.title: Critical Role Inktober 2018
blog.description:
tag with #crinktober 
/ the unofficial inktober prompt list for critical role, brought to you by @thunder-lizards

summary: If I can't draw, can I participate by writing for each prompt instead?
question: If I can't draw, can I participate by writing for each prompt instead?
answer: I mean, for sure! It’s not something I’ve seen done before for inktober, but writing was done in ink once upon a time. So yeh! Be sure to tag us or shoot us a message when the time comes!

reblog.comment: I mean, for sure! It’s not something I’ve seen done before for inktober, but writing was done in ink once upon a time. So yeh! Be sure to tag us or shoot us a message when the time comes!

trail.content_raw: I mean, for sure! It’s not something I’ve seen done before for inktober, but writing was done in ink once upon a time. So yeh! Be sure to tag us or shoot us a message when the time comes!

tags: I live blog reactions when I am able to watch it live
this happened on one of my posts from last night
not a big deal just saying it to say it
summary: Just for future note, anything tagged “live blogging” is literally my spur of the moment thoughts as the show is airing live....
body:
Just for future note, anything tagged “live blogging” is literally my spur of the moment thoughts as the show is airing live.

Please don’t post replies meant to debate the results of live predictions that turned out to be wrong…it was happening at the same time lol I didn’t know what was going to happen.

Anyway…moving right along :D

reblog.comment:
Just for future note, anything tagged “live blogging” is literally my spur of the moment thoughts as the show is airing live.

Anyway…moving right along :D

Anyway…moving right along :D

blog.name: luckthebard
blog.title: Luck the Bard
blog.description: 30s, Queer (Lesbian), I love D&D; My brother got me hooked on Critical Role. I try but don't always tag spoilers so this account is not #spoilerfree

summary: I had to pause and fan myself after Liam’s turn where he had Caleb cast Catapult at a paralyzed target, did 30 points of damage,...
body:
I had to pause and fan myself after Liam’s turn where he had Caleb cast Catapult at a paralyzed target, did 30 points of damage, and took advantage of it being a transmutation spell to change his transmuter’s stone’s properties.

That was peak wizard strategy and as a fellow wizard player I’m bursting with pride.
